channel.title: Matrix magic book and quest tab customizing
channel.description: I haven't found out how to customize quest tab and mage book. I know how to change actions of lets say varrock teleport but I don't know how to change varrock teleport text to minigames teleport. Also I wonder how can I change quest names to something else or clear them out.

item.title: Matrix magic book and quest tab customizing
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

I haven’t found out how to customize quest tab and mage book. I know how to change actions of lets say varrock teleport but I don’t know how to change varrock teleport text to minigames teleport. Also I wonder how can I change quest names to something else or clear them out.
